name: GetPayslipsByEmploymentIdAndPayrollRunId
description:
__Activity name :__ GetPayslipsByEmploymentIdAndPayrollRunId

Download the payslips or its underlying payroll results of an employment for the specified payrollrun

**Please note: this endpoint has two types of output:**
* the payslip(s) as a single PDF-file
* the underlying payroll result data for the payslip(s) in JSON-format  

This may be specified by providing the desired format in the `Accept` header of your request.

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

employmentId.description: The unique identifier of the employment

payrollrunId.description: The unique identifier of the payroll run

$ul: **obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**employmentId**: The unique identifier of an object (GUID/UUID)

$block: data to be used for paging

$ul: **currentPage**: Current page returned in the response
**pageSize**: Number of records in the response
**totalSize**: Total number of records, taking into account the given filter.
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
